TopicTitle: My take on the space shuttle

Articles.Content:
![CWwFatR.png](http://i.imgur.com/CWwFatR.png)

![X36OFgK.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/X36OFgK.jpg)

I feel like a lot of the shuttle replica's posted either rely on massive amounts of clipped in rcs or sas to function or are extremely difficult to control. My design utilises a number of mods to free the craft of such requirements and make it both more realistic and more usable.

mission profile:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/U01SS)

Here is the list of mods and adjustments that allows this shuttle to function.

necessary:

[KW Rocketry]([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014))

editing the config files of the mainsail engine found in 'gamedata, squad, parts, engines, mainsail' to allow for 10 degrees of gimballing instead of 1, 10 being a more realistic and useful value.

recommended:

[kerbal joint reinforcement]([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-90-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-2-3-26-15](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-90-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-2-3-26-15))

[throttle controlled avionics]([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67270-Throttle-Controlled-Avionics-1-4-1-0-90-(5-January-15)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67270-Throttle-Controlled-Avionics-1-4-1-0-90-%285-January-15%29))

[stock part revamp (the bits to edit to allow more gimballing are in different places but idea is the same)]([http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-90-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-7-2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-90-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-7-2)!)

[the shuttle itself]([https://mega.co.nz/#!6EtwxQbb!dTbmbwkAljVGrPHthwAAEopCW96TQ0__6FVxMAffO34](https://mega.co.nz/#!6EtwxQbb!dTbmbwkAljVGrPHthwAAEopCW96TQ0__6FVxMAffO34))

I am new to the forums and this is my first thread post so suggestions, questions and feedback are welcomed (:
